Title: Tetris
Description: Basic Tetris game. The game can be played like most basic Tetris games. Made with C#

Title: Tic Tac Toe
Description: Basic Tic Tac Toe game. NOTE: There is no AI built into the game. Made with C#

Title: Hello World Pro
Description: This is not just a simple Hello World program, it's much more then that. In this app, there is DRY, Dependency Injection, Unit Testing and more! Made with C#

Title: Console ATM
Description: A basic ATM application. Made with C#
